00034     class ilut_tag
00035     {
00036       public:
00042         ilut_tag(unsigned int entries_per_row = 10,
00043                  double drop_tolerance = 1e-3) : _entries_per_row(entries_per_row), _drop_tolerance(drop_tolerance) {}; 
00044 
00045         void set_drop_tolerance(double tol)
00046         {
00047           if (tol > 0)
00048             _drop_tolerance = tol;
00049         }
00050         double get_drop_tolerance() const { return _drop_tolerance; }
00051         
00052         void set_entries_per_row(unsigned int e)
00053         {
00054           if (e > 0)
00055             _entries_per_row = e;
00056         }
00057 
00058         unsigned int get_entries_per_row() const { return _entries_per_row; }
00059 
00060       private:
00061         unsigned int _entries_per_row;
00062         double _drop_tolerance;
00063     };

00074     template<typename MatrixType, typename LUType>
00075     void precondition(MatrixType const & input, LUType & output, ilut_tag const & tag)
00076     {
00077       typedef std::map<unsigned int, double>          SparseVector;
00078       typedef typename SparseVector::iterator         SparseVectorIterator;
00079       typedef typename MatrixType::const_iterator1    InputRowIterator;  //iterate along increasing row index
00080       typedef typename MatrixType::const_iterator2    InputColIterator;  //iterate along increasing column index
00081       typedef typename LUType::iterator1              OutputRowIterator;  //iterate along increasing row index
00082       typedef typename LUType::iterator2              OutputColIterator;  //iterate along increasing column index
00083 
00084       output.clear();
00085       assert(input.size1() == output.size1());
00086       assert(input.size2() == output.size2());
00087       output.resize(static_cast<unsigned int>(input.size1()), static_cast<unsigned int>(input.size2()), false);
00088       SparseVector w;
00089       
00090       std::map<double, unsigned int> temp_map;
00091       
00092       for (InputRowIterator row_iter = input.begin1(); row_iter != input.end1(); ++row_iter)
00093       {
00094     /*    if (i%10 == 0)
00095       std::cout << i << std::endl;*/
00096         
00097         //line 2:
00098         w.clear();
00099         for (InputColIterator col_iter = row_iter.begin(); col_iter != row_iter.end(); ++col_iter)
00100           w[static_cast<unsigned int>(col_iter.index2())] = *col_iter;
00101 
00102         //line 3:
00103         OutputRowIterator row_iter_out = output.begin1();
00104         for (SparseVectorIterator k = w.begin(); k != w.end();)
00105         {
00106           unsigned int index_k = k->first;
00107           if (index_k >= row_iter.index1())
00108             break;
00109           
00110           while (row_iter_out.index1() < index_k)
00111             ++row_iter_out;
00112           
00113           //line 4:
00114           double temp = k->second / output(index_k, index_k);
00115           if (output(index_k, index_k) == 0.0)
00116           {
00117             std::cerr << "FATAL ERROR in ILUT(): Diagonal entry is zero!" << std::endl;
00118           }
00119           
00120           //line 5: (dropping rule to w_k)
00121           if ( fabs(temp) > tag.get_drop_tolerance())
00122           {
00123             //line 7:
00124             for (OutputColIterator j = row_iter_out.begin(); j != row_iter_out.end(); ++j)
00125             {
00126               if (j.index2() > index_k) //attention: manipulation of w(k->first) would invalidate iterator!
00127               {
00128                 w[j.index2()] -= temp * *j;
00129               }
00130             }
00131             ++k;  //attention: manipulation of w(k->first) would invalidate iterator!
00132             w[index_k] = temp;// - temp * A(index_k, index_k);
00133           }
00134           else
00135             ++k;
00136         } //for k
00137         
00138         //Line 10: Apply a dropping rule to w
00139         //Step 1: Sort all entries:
00140         temp_map.clear();
00141         for (SparseVectorIterator k = w.begin(); k != w.end(); )
00142         {
00143           if (fabs(k->second) < tag.get_drop_tolerance())
00144           { 
00145             long index = k->first;
00146             ++k;
00147             w.erase(index);
00148           }
00149           else
00150           {
00151             double temp = fabs(k->second);
00152             while (temp_map.find(temp) != temp_map.end())
00153               temp *= 1.00000001; //make entry slightly larger to maintain uniqueness of the entry
00154             temp_map[temp] = k->first;
00155             ++k;
00156           }
00157         }
00158 
00159         //Lines 10-12: write the largest p values to L and U
00160         unsigned int written_L = 0;
00161         unsigned int written_U = 0;
00162         for (typename std::map<double, unsigned int>::reverse_iterator iter = temp_map.rbegin(); iter != temp_map.rend(); ++iter)
00163         {
00164           if (iter->second > static_cast<unsigned int>(row_iter.index1())) //entry for U
00165           {
00166             if (written_U < tag.get_entries_per_row())
00167             {
00168               output(static_cast<unsigned int>(row_iter.index1()), iter->second) = static_cast<typename LUType::value_type>(w[iter->second]);
00169               ++written_U;
00170             }
00171           }
00172           else if (iter->second == row_iter.index1())
00173           {
00174             output(iter->second, iter->second) = static_cast<typename LUType::value_type>(w[static_cast<unsigned int>(row_iter.index1())]);
00175           }
00176           else //entry for L
00177           {
00178             if (written_L < tag.get_entries_per_row())
00179             {
00180               output(static_cast<unsigned int>(row_iter.index1()), iter->second) = static_cast<typename LUType::value_type>(w[iter->second]);
00181               ++written_L;
00182             }
00183           }
00184         }
00185       } //for i
00186     }

00194     template<typename MatrixType, typename VectorType>
00195     void inplace_solve(MatrixType const & mat, VectorType & vec, viennacl::linalg::unit_lower_tag)
00196     {
00197       typedef typename MatrixType::const_iterator1    InputRowIterator;  //iterate along increasing row index
00198       typedef typename MatrixType::const_iterator2    InputColIterator;  //iterate along increasing column index
00199       
00200       for (InputRowIterator row_iter = mat.begin1(); row_iter != mat.end1(); ++row_iter)
00201       {
00202         for (InputColIterator col_iter = row_iter.begin(); col_iter != row_iter.end(); ++col_iter)
00203         {
00204           if (col_iter.index2() < col_iter.index1())
00205             vec[col_iter.index1()] -= *col_iter * vec[col_iter.index2()];
00206         }
00207       }
00208     }
00209 
00215     template<typename MatrixType, typename VectorType>
00216     void inplace_solve(MatrixType const & mat, VectorType & vec, viennacl::linalg::upper_tag)
00217     {
00218       typedef typename MatrixType::const_reverse_iterator1    InputRowIterator;  //iterate along increasing row index
00219       typedef typename MatrixType::const_iterator2            InputColIterator;  //iterate along increasing column index
00220       typedef typename VectorType::value_type                 ScalarType;
00221       
00222       ScalarType diagonal_entry = 1.0;
00223       
00224       for (InputRowIterator row_iter = mat.rbegin1(); row_iter != mat.rend1(); ++row_iter)
00225       {
00226         for (InputColIterator col_iter = row_iter.begin(); col_iter != row_iter.end(); ++col_iter)
00227         {
00228           if (col_iter.index2() > col_iter.index1())
00229             vec[col_iter.index1()] -= *col_iter * vec[col_iter.index2()];
00230           if (col_iter.index2() == col_iter.index1())
00231             diagonal_entry = *col_iter;
00232         }
00233         vec[row_iter.index1()] /= diagonal_entry;
00234       }
00235     }
00236 
00242     template<typename MatrixType, typename VectorType>
00243     void lu_substitute(MatrixType const & mat, VectorType & vec)
00244     {
00245       inplace_solve(mat, vec, unit_lower_tag());
00246       inplace_solve(mat, vec, upper_tag());
00247     }

00252     template <typename MatrixType>
00253     class ilut_precond
00254     {
00255       typedef typename MatrixType::value_type      ScalarType;
00256       
00257       public:
00258         ilut_precond(MatrixType const & mat, ilut_tag const & tag) : _tag(tag), LU(mat.size1())
00259         {
00260           //initialize preconditioner:
00261           //std::cout << "Start CPU precond" << std::endl;
00262           init(mat);          
00263           //std::cout << "End CPU precond" << std::endl;
00264         }
00265         
00266         template <typename VectorType>
00267         void apply(VectorType & vec) const
00268         {
00269           viennacl::tools::const_sparse_matrix_adapter<ScalarType> LU_const_adapter(LU);
00270           viennacl::linalg::lu_substitute(LU_const_adapter, vec);
00271         }
00272         
00273       private:
00274         void init(MatrixType const & mat)
00275         {
00276           viennacl::tools::sparse_matrix_adapter<ScalarType>       LU_adapter(LU);
00277           viennacl::linalg::precondition(mat, LU_adapter, _tag);
00278         }
00279         
00280         ilut_tag const & _tag;
00281         std::vector< std::map<unsigned int, ScalarType> > LU;
00282     };

00289     template <typename ScalarType, unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00290     class ilut_precond< compressed_matrix<ScalarType, MAT_ALIGNMENT> >
00291     {
00292       typedef compressed_matrix<ScalarType, MAT_ALIGNMENT>   MatrixType;
00293       
00294       public:
00295         ilut_precond(MatrixType const & mat, ilut_tag const & tag) : _tag(tag), LU(mat.size1())
00296         {
00297           //initialize preconditioner:
00298           //std::cout << "Start GPU precond" << std::endl;
00299           init(mat);          
00300           //std::cout << "End GPU precond" << std::endl;
00301         }
00302         
00303         void apply(vector<ScalarType> & vec) const
00304         {
00305           copy(vec, temp_vec);
00306           //lu_substitute(LU, vec);
00307           viennacl::tools::const_sparse_matrix_adapter<ScalarType> LU_const_adapter(LU);
00308           viennacl::linalg::lu_substitute(LU_const_adapter, temp_vec);
00309           
00310           copy(temp_vec, vec);
00311         }
00312         
00313       private:
00314         void init(MatrixType const & mat)
00315         {
00316           std::vector< std::map<unsigned int, ScalarType> > temp(mat.size1());
00317           //std::vector< std::map<unsigned int, ScalarType> > LU_cpu(mat.size1());
00318 
00319           //copy to cpu:
00320           copy(mat, temp);
00321           
00322           viennacl::tools::const_sparse_matrix_adapter<ScalarType>       temp_adapter(temp);
00323           viennacl::tools::sparse_matrix_adapter<ScalarType>       LU_adapter(LU);
00324           viennacl::linalg::precondition(temp_adapter, LU_adapter, _tag);
00325           
00326           temp_vec.resize(mat.size1());
00327           
00328           //copy resulting preconditioner back to gpu:
00329           //copy(LU_cpu, LU);
00330         }
00331         
00332         ilut_tag const & _tag;
00333         //MatrixType LU;
00334         std::vector< std::map<unsigned int, ScalarType> > LU;
00335         mutable std::vector<ScalarType> temp_vec;
00336     };
